config.siddhiApp: @App:name('APIMSignupsAnalyticsSiddhi') @primaryKey('SUBSCRIBER_ID') @store(type="rdbms" , datasource="AM_DB") define table AM_SUBSCRIBER(SUBSCRIBER_ID int,USER_ID string,TENANT_ID int,EMAIL_ADDRESS string,DATE_SUBSCRIBED string,CREATED_BY string,CREATED_TIME string,UPDATED_BY string,UPDATED_TIME string);

queryData.query: from AM_SUBSCRIBER on CREATED_TIME>='{{timeFrom}}' AND CREATED_TIME<='{{timeTo}}' select USER_ID,CREATED_TIME,count(USER_ID) AS count group by CREATED_TIME;
